Have a look at list of our most popular Frequently asked questions & answers:

[vc_tta_accordion shape="square" spacing="3" c_position="right" active_section="1" no_fill="true"][vc_tta_section title=”Can I decide in which companies I want to invest?” tab_id=”1477080808905-4184e5e5-b8d5″][vc_column_text]Yes, You can do this by allocating your investment to specific companies at the time you invest. You may also earnmark some nds for the overall pool, so that you can take advantage of new equity crowdfunding investment opportunities as they are vetted.
Whenever we bring new oppotunities to investors,they allways have the option to opt-out of funding a specific company.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”How do I make an investment?” tab_id=”1477080808984-9ff27de1-3f94″][vc_column_text]I am text block.
